text: The Yinchuan Ring Expressway (), designated as G2004 is an expressway in Ningxia, Northern China orbiting the city of Yinchuan. This expressway is a branch of G6 Beijing–Lhasa Expressway. ==Detailed Itinerary== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" width="600px" ! text- align="center" colspan="3" | 15px Clockwise 15px |- style="background:#f5f5dc;" | (1189) || 30px 25px || 30px G6 Jingla Expressway |- style="background:#ffb71a;" | colspan="7" | 30px Yinchuan-South Toll Station |- style="background:#f5f5dc;" | 1 || 25px || 30px G109 Road Wangyuan Yinchuan-East |- style="background:#f5f5dc;" | 7 || 25px || S Qinshui Street S Zhengyuan Street Yinchuan-Centre |- style="background:#f5f5dc;" align="center" | 9 || 25px || Tongda S Street {| border=0 |- size=40 | bgcolor=#960 style="font-size: 10pt;
